subject: A shipment from order #SSN2625
description_text:
Hi. Why is no one responding for a long time again? I placed an order on
September 11th. Today is already December 12th. It's been 3 months,
although the stated delivery time is 5-12 days. If you are unable to
deliver the order or predict the delivery time, refund the money. I need a
clear answer.: Are you able to deliver the order within the next month or
not (before January 12th)? If not, return my money.
